answers.answer: I heard that it can be worse. Eeek no fun. I'm dealing with the same thing as you and will have to be induced also :/ good luck

I am pregnant with number 4 I was induced with my second son and went into labor on my own with my 3 I was dealing with the contractions with my 3 son until I had to have pitocin to help dialate me and I can say being induced is more painful then going on your own ... Don't let it stress you either way baby is coming out and no way is painless ... Good luck

The drip to speed up contractions isnt nice, but it really depends on the method they use on you. There is a gel that they can use to encourage the cervix to open, as far as I am aware it doesnt cause a labour any more painful than a spontaneous one. If it were me I would ask to try that before letting them use the drip. Be very aware of all your pain relief options, you may need them (but you might not!!)

question: I'm getting induced september 12 due to gestational hypertension to prevent preeclampsia.I've heard being induced is a worse labor than letting nature take its course.Anyone know if this is true?
title: induced
